Description:
DNSExfiltrator allows for transferring (exfiltrate) a file over a DNS request covert channel

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell DNSExfiltration
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" scriptblocktext="*Invoke-DNSExfiltrator*" (scriptblocktext="* -i *" scriptblocktext="* -d *" scriptblocktext="* -p *" scriptblocktext="* -doh *" scriptblocktext="* -t *")
